title: Exquisite Nakshi Work Diamond and Emerald Kasulaperu Haaram with Pearls
materials: South Sea Pearls (Moti - 6.60ct). Meticulously crafted with a Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This breathtaking Kasulaperu Haaram showcases the timeless Nakshi work craftsmanship, a signature of South Indian temple jewelry. Delicately placed diamonds are arranged in floral patterns, intertwined with vibrant emeralds and rubies. The central pendant features intricate filigree detailing, culminating in a graceful cascade of lustrous South Sea pearls (Moti). The necklace embodies a perfect blend of tradition and contemporary elegance.
colors: warm gold tone complemented by the vibrant green of the emeralds
the rich red of the rubies
the sparkling white of the diamonds
and the soft ivory hue of the pearls. This classic South Indian color palette exudes opulence and grace.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement of refined elegance. Also suitable for upscale cultural events and grand celebrations.
description: This Haaram is a true heirloom piece, reflecting the rich cultural heritage of South India. The combination of Nakshi work, precious gemstones, and lustrous pearls creates a timeless design that will be cherished for generations. The superior craftsmanship ensures durability and lasting beauty. The necklace carries traditional significance, symbolizing prosperity, good fortune, and marital bliss (Mangalyam).
